actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-954, by Mr. Bonior.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 216.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 390 - 26 (Roll no. 524).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving certain points of order against consideration of the Conference Report on the bill (S. 1630) to amend the Clean Air Act to provide for attainment and maintenance of health protective national ambient air quality standards, and for other purposes, and against its consideration.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 1630 (air quality).

titles.title: Waiving certain points of order against consideration of the Conference Report on the bill (S. 1630) to amend the Clean Air Act to provide for attainment and maintenance of health protective national ambient air quality standards, and for other purposes, and against its consideration.
